title: The value of C-reactive protein velocity (CRPv) on mortality in sepsis patients who are emergently hospitalized in the ICU: A retrospective single-center study
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Ayşin Kılınç Toker, İlhami Çelik, Ayşe Turunç Özdemir, Hande Sağlam, Derya Koçer, Murat Eşlik, İbrahim Toker
